content.body: FYI -- module harmony meeting has moved to every Tuesday (and duration reduced to 1 hour).  as such, there is now a bi-weekly conflict w/ async context meeting.  mentioning this as there is some overlap with participants
why was it changed to weekly?
I don't know -- appears to be a decision they came to previously.  meeting is going on right now. I can ask if there is time

- quicker iteration
- not enough meetings between plenary meetings
- reduce duration
- have 3 meetings with Kris Kowal prior to plenary
content.formatted_body:
• quicker iteration
  • not enough meetings between plenary meetings
  • reduce duration
  • have 3 meetings with Kris Kowal prior to plenary
